name: GRIM (MidoriMonki)
description:
A short game I created for round 1 of the GDKO 23 game jam. (It's more of an art piece than a game.) Sorry about the lack of sound effects, I'm not good at audio.

Play as Lily, a girl who ends up in a strange world below the elevator in her apartment. Complete fun tasks like collecting the Heart Engine's favourite flowers! Maybe even talk to the locals. They have interesting things to say, especially about their Guardian! Did you know that 684111 is the Heart Engine's favourite number!

CONTROLS: 

Walk up to things and use space to interact and cycle through dialogue. WASD or the Arrow keys for movement.

This game was inspired by Little Nightmares and Petscop.
